page.title: 11EARDINGTON MANOR GROUNDS
page.content: The{10}surrounding{acres}of ground are divided into 4 different sections. The 1st and biggest is the main garden and contains a variety of flowers and plants.Adjacent to this is a newly built swimming-pool complete with its own heating system and springboard. The next largest area is used as a vegetable plot for growing fruit and vegetables.A gardener comes twice a week to ensure that the gardens are kept looking their best.On the other side of the house are a number of stables which are now used as store rooms.It is still possible to see the original timbers and bridle hooks. As well as the main garden there are {several smaller gardens}around the house.We thought the gardens were well kept and made the house look very picturesque.
